revision.text:
{{doomwiki|Launcher|Launcher}} A '''frontend''' or '''launcher''' is a utility that allows the user to control or change certain settings before loading [[Doom]] without requiring the user to use [[command line parameters]].
Arguably the best and most popular launcher is [[ZDL]] and its variants, as they can support multiple (and custom) [[source port]]s and [[IWAD]]s, and have a very user friendly interface.
The following is a list of frontends that currently support [[ZDoom]]: * [[Doom Launcher]]- .NET 4.5 (May, 2016) * [http://www.jodwin.com/cdl/ C#4rp Doom Launcher] - .NET (Aug, 2009) * [[Doomloader]]- Perl (Jul 02, 2005) * [https://github.com/Hypnotoad90/RocketLauncher2 Rocket Launcher 2.0]- C++/Qt (Apr, 2016) * [[UNLEASHED|Unleashed]] - Win32 + VB6 (Jun 29, 2003) * [[ZDL]] - C++/Qt (Aug 08, 2012) * [[ZDoom Launcher]] - Win32 executable only (Feb 04, 2005) * [[ZDoom Runner]] - Win32 executable only (May, 2015) * [[ZDoom Executor]] - Win32 executable only (Jan 13, 2015) * [http://nephrite.uk/arachnotron Arachnotron]- C++/Qt (Feb, 2019) * [[Tray Launcher Sharp]]
[[Category:Tools|*]]
